name: liwan
description: Liwan is a lightweight YouTube front-end. It provides ad-free playback, basic privacy filters, and a clean UI for browsing and viewing, ideal for those looking to avoid tracking in video consumption.
features: YouTube Frontend: Ad-free viewing, Privacy filters, Clean interface. Watch YouTube without tracking.
Lightweight: Fast loading, Minimal resources, Simple design. Efficient video browsing.
Self-Hosted: No Google tracking, Privacy-focused, Custom deployment. Control your video viewing.
Ad-Free Experience: No advertisements, Clean playback, Uninterrupted viewing. Watch without distractions.
Privacy Protection: No tracking cookies, Anonymous viewing, Data minimization. Browse privately.
Video Playback: HD streaming, Quality selection, Playback controls. Full viewing features.
Search Functionality: Video search, Channel browsing, Trending content. Find what you want.
Subscription Management: Follow channels, Track uploads, Personalized feed. Stay updated on favorites.
